about_the_game:
Contains all of the musical tracks included in the base game.

Dylan Rex
Verona Sand Piper Fight Song
Summer
Boardwalk
Coffee
Mercutio
Benvolio
Authority
Party
Romeo and Juliet
To install:

- Download the DLC.
- The music folder will be located in the game folder where your Steam game folders are located (steamapps/common/DashingDinos/)
